li.label: ate xayhir
li.description: I was filled up and it tasted nice, but something is off.

li.label: ate xayhir
li.description: I'm sure of it now, my food is watching me. I'm seeing eyes in the walls.

li.label: ate xayhir
li.description: What's going on? Why is everything covered in eyes?? HELP!!!

li.label: ate xayhir
li.description: I'm so relieved that was over with...
